sentences.en: A friendly interface and multifunctional application program has been developed by VB 6.0.

sentences.en: A multifunctional additive ARJ for drilling fluid was synthesized by emulsion polymerization.

sentences.en: A principle and optimization method of multifunctional vibration - absorption megaframe structures is presented.

sentences.en: Has the ability to coordinate with multifunctional groups; Good communication ability.

sentences.en: It is pure, simple and designed as a multifunctional domestic object.

sentences.en: Neuropilin ( NRP ) is a multifunctional receptor for Semaphorin and VEGF _ ( 165 ).

sentences.en: This hormone is multifunctional, but one of its main tasks is to act as a neurotransmitter and regulate serotonin levels.

sentences.en: Today maritime radar has digital, multifunctional, high powered, multi - interface and network settings.

sentences.en: Yasmin: Yes, he said he's going to go for a multifunctional photocopier.
